actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Parks, Preservation and Recreation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Historic Preservation and Recreation

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study of alternatives for commemorating and interpreting the history of the Harlem Renaissance, and for other purposes.
short_title: Harlem Renaissance Cultural Zone Act of 1999

summary.text: Harlem Renaissance Cultural Zone Act of 1999 - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study of alternatives for commemorating and interpreting the history of the Harlem Renaissance, including: (1) establishment of a new unit of the National Park System; (2) establishment of various designations for sites relating to such history; and (3) cooperative arrangements with State and local governments, historical organizations, and other entities.

titles.title: Harlem Renaissance Cultural Zone Act of 1999
A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study of alternatives for commemorating and interpreting the history of the Harlem Renaissance, and for other purposes.
